Pureschi.f90

Go to the documentation of this file.
00001 !******************************************************************************
00002 ! Subroutine to Initialize, calculate the RHS, and calculate the Jacobian
00003 ! of the Pureschi and Russo problem 
00004 !******************************************************************************
00005 ! REQUIRED FILES:
00006 ! PRECISION_VARS.F90        *DEFINES PRECISION FOR ALL VARIABLES
00007 ! CONTROL_VARIABLES.F90     *CONTAINS VARIABLES AND ALLOCATION ROUTINES
00008 !******************************************************************************
00009       module Pureschi_mod
00010       private
00011       public :: Pureschi
00012       contains
00013       subroutine Pureschi(nveclen,ep,dt,tfinal,iDT,resE_vec,resI_vec,akk)
00014 
00015       use precision_vars,    only: wp, pi
00016       use control_variables, only: temporal_splitting,probname,xjac, &
00017      &                             tol,dt_error_tol,uvec,uexact,programstep
00018 
00019       implicit none; save
00020 
00021       integer,  parameter    :: vecl=2
00022 
00023       !INIT vars
00024       real(wp),                  intent(in   ) :: ep
00025       real(wp),                  intent(inout) :: dt
00026       integer,                   intent(  out) :: nveclen
00027       real(wp),                  intent(  out) :: tfinal
00028       integer,                   intent(in   ) :: iDT
00029 
00030       real(wp), dimension(81,vecl+1)           :: ExactTot
00031       real(wp)                                 :: diff
00032       integer                                  :: i
00033 
00034       !RHS vars
00035       real(wp), dimension(vecl), intent(  out) :: resE_vec,resI_vec
00036       
00037       !Jacob vars
00038       real(wp), intent(in   ) :: akk
00039 !------------------------------------------------------------------------------
00040  
00041       Program_Step_Select: select case(programstep)
00042         !**Pre-initialization. Get problem name and vector length**
00043         case('INITIALIZE_PROBLEM_INFORMATION')
00044           nvecLen = vecl
00045           probname='Pureschi '   
00046           tol=1.0e-12_wp
00047           dt_error_tol=1.0e-13_wp
00048         
00049         !**Initialization of problem information**        
00050         case('SET_INITIAL_CONDITIONS')
00051       
00052           !Time information
00053           dt = 0.5_wp/10**((iDT-1)/20._wp) ! timestep
00054           tfinal = 5.0_wp                  ! final time
00055 
00056           !**Exact Solution**
00057           open(unit=39,file='exact.pureschi.1.data')
00058           rewind(39)
00059           do i=1,81
00060             read(39,*)ExactTot(i,1),ExactTot(i,2)
00061             ExactTot(i,3) = 1.0_wp/10**((i-1)/(10.0_wp)) !  used for 81 values of ep
00062             enddo
00063 
00064           do i=1,81
00065             diff = abs(ExactTot(i,3) - ep)
00066             if(diff.le.1.0e-10_wp)then
00067               uexact(1) = ExactTot(i,1)
00068               uexact(2) = ExactTot(i,2)
00069               exit
00070             endif
00071           enddo
00072 
00073           !**Equilibrium IC**
00074           uvec(1) = pi/2.0_wp
00075           uvec(2) = sin(pi/2.0_wp)
00076 
00077         case('BUILD_RHS')
00078           choose_RHS_type: select case (Temporal_Splitting)
00079             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00080               resE_vec(1) = dt*(-uvec(2))
00081               resE_vec(2) = dt*(+uvec(1))
00082               resI_vec(1) = 0.0_wp
00083               resI_vec(2) = dt*(sin(uvec(1)) - uvec(2))/ep
00084             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00085               resE_vec(:) = 0.0_wp
00086               resI_vec(1) = dt*(-uvec(2))
00087               resI_vec(2) = dt*(+uvec(1) + (sin(uvec(1)) - uvec(2))/ep)
00088           end select choose_RHS_type
00089 
00090         case('BUILD_JACOBIAN')
00091           choose_Jac_type: select case(Temporal_Splitting)
00092             case('IMEX') ! For IMEX schemes
00093               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00094               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(0.0_wp)
00095               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(cos(uvec(1)) )/ep
00096               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-1.0_wp)/ep
00097             case('IMPLICIT') ! For fully implicit schemes
00098               xjac(1,1) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(+0.0_wp)
00099               xjac(1,2) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(-1.0_wp)
00100               xjac(2,1) = 0.0_wp-akk*dt*(+1.0_wp + cos(uvec(1))/ep)
00101               xjac(2,2) = 1.0_wp-akk*dt*(-1.0_wp)/ep
00102           end select choose_Jac_type
00103           
00104       end select Program_Step_Select     
00105       end subroutine Pureschi
00106       end module Pureschi_mod
